## Block.moveBy() method

Move a block by a relative offset.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
moveBy(dx: number, dy: number): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  dx | number | Horizontal offset, in workspace units. |
|  dy | number | Vertical offset, in workspace units. |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
